args.text: Some of the current exhibitions at the Metropolitan Museum of Art include a rooftop garden installation by Lauren Halsey, "Karl Lagerfeld: A Line of Beauty" showcasing the late designer's fashion pieces, "Berenice Abbott's New York Album, 1929" featuring black-and-white images of New York City, "Richard Avedon: Murals" showcasing life-size photomurals, "The Facade Commission: Hew Locke, Gilt" featuring gold-hued sculptures on the exterior of the museum, and a permanent exhibition called "The Polonsky Exhibition of The New York Public Library's Treasures" displaying over 250 unique and rare items from the library's research centers.
